casebody.data:
Harriet S. Geragosian et al. v. Zoning Board of Appeals of the City of New Britain et al.

Alcorn, 0. J., House, Thim, Ryan and Shea, Js.

Argued October 14 decided November 10, 1970 John F. Walsh, for the appellants (defendant Seaman et al.); with him, on the brief, was George J. Coyle, corporation counsel, for the appellant (named defendant). Mitchell Gardner, for the appellees (plaintiffs). *555Per Curiam.

Upon the record before us the conclusion of the trial court that the defendant board of appeals improperly granted the special exception appealed from cannot be disturbed.

There is no error.
